creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: several vignettes of men and women carousing; men rowing sleeping women on boats; women performing instruments and lounging inside buildings with barred windows; scenes inside tea houses and behind screens; ivory roller ends
medium: Ink, color, and gold on paper
provenance: Baron Kuki, Director of the Tokyo National Museum in Meiji times and his son Kuki Saburo.
title: Scenes from the Pleasure Quarters
